content.raw: How did you get this to work? I think I need to build this branch from source as well as Gazebo default and sdformat default both from source (from the notes and comments above), but I'm having trouble getting it to work. I can build everything from source, but when I build default Gazebo, which has the required changes for the update_irobot_hand branch, then when I run roslaunch I get an error: "Error [ConnectionManager.cc:123] Connection Manager is not running".
content.html: How did you get this to work? I think I need to build this branch from source as well as Gazebo default and sdformat default both from source (from the notes and comments above), but I'm having trouble getting it to work. I can build everything from source, but when I build default Gazebo, which has the required changes for the update_irobot_hand branch, then when I run roslaunch I get an error: "Error [ConnectionManager.cc:123] Connection Manager is not running".
